panels.description: This KPI shows the non-GBR DRB radio admission requests for SA user, for the given slice and PLMN.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NSL_M55149C00002:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

panels.title: NR_5207a 5G SA Number of non-GBR DRB radio admission requests for SA user, per PLMN, per slice / nonGBR DRB AC req PLMN slice [#]

panels.description: This KPI shows the success ratio of non-GBR DRB radio admission for SA user, for the given slice and PLMN.

settings.script: if (params.am55149c00002 == null) {return null} else if(params.m55149c00002 == 0) {return 0} else {return (100*(params.m55149c00003)/(params.m55149c00002))}

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NSL_M55149C00002:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NSL_M55149C01001:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NSL_M55149C01001:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

panels.description: This KPI shows the PDCP SDU data volume transmitted via gNB in downlink direction for the given Slice and PLMN. Discarded DL PDCP SDUs are not counted.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NPSL_M55328C00003:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

panels.title: NR_5136a 5G SA PDCP SDU transmitted data volume in downlink per slice / PDCP SDU vol DL slice [MB]

panels.description: This KPI shows the PDCP SDU data volume received at gNB in uplink direction for the given Slice and PLMN. Discarded UL PDCP SDUs are not counted.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NPSL_M55328C00005:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

panels.description: This KPI shows the downlink average delay for PDCP SDUs per slice, calculated as time difference between the reception of the PDCP SDU from NG-U and DL PDCP PDU is sent towards RLC layer.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NPSL_M55328C00006:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

settings.script: if (params.am55328c00007 == null) {return null} else if(params.m55328c00004 == 0) {return 0} else {return (params.m55328c00007)/(params.m55328c00004)}

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NPSL_M55328C00007:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data.NSL_M55149C00005:* AND (pm_data_source.dn:*NRBTS* OR pm_data_source.dn:*SST*)
